mapper.select: SELECT profile_visibility FROM users WHERE user_id = #{targetUserId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT follow_id, follower_id, followee_id, status, created_at, updated_at FROM user_follows WHERE follower_id = #{userId} AND followee_id = #{targetUserId} LIMIT 1

SELECT uf.follow_id AS request_id, uf.follower_id AS user_id, u.nickname AS nickname, uf.status AS status, uf.created_at AS created_at FROM user_follows uf JOIN users u ON u.user_id = uf.follower_id WHERE uf.followee_id = #{userId} AND uf.status = 'PENDING' AND u.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY uf.created_at DESC
